mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, Q.* FROM (SELECT qna_no as qnaNo, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_writer as qnaWriter, qna_reg_date as qnaRegDate, qna_read_count as qnaReadCount FROM QNA_TBL ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC)Q) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_writer as qnaWriter, qna_reg_date as qnaRegDate, qna_read_count as qnaReadCount from qna_tbl where qna_no = #{_parameter}
select file_no as fileNo, filename, filepath, file_ext as fileExt from file_tbl where ref_no = #{_parameter} and file_divi = 'Q'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_TBL VALUES(QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 2, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, 0, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{qnaWriter}, null, 'N')
